column5: After reading BBNotty's report last night... I knew I had to get out once more before the float gears are put away...    I'll keep the report short cause im too lazy/tired to type anything extra.  Haven't fished a chilly morning for a while...my fingers were quite numb for the first half hour or so until I hooked into the first fish . My buddy went 2/3 and I went 5/8 this morning..which is quite incredible since its already mid May! All fish were found in 4-5ft deep holes, I guess they were absorbing the heat from the sun. My buddy and I both lost several good size (pushing 12lbs) fish into logjams. The ones we landed were ranged from 3-5lbs, nothing crazy.   here are a few pictures..           Hey MJL, so WHEN are we going to go for a drift?! or your too busy fishing for carp.
Kelfun, great job buddy and nice steely. Yes it was a cold morning i froze too.  Berge
Great job KelfuN on those beauty chromes Thanks for sharing Leechman
Beauty fish.  I think the pin's gone away until next fall for me.
nice steel yhose are some nice looking fish
i think you need to come out and chase some carp with us buddy.  only way to lessen the pain of your so-called STD  haha

Now that was just mean! You know I'm working through an addiction to chrome  Young grasshopper, I must show you the ways of the jedi carping force (Being a carping Jedi master myself   )... Only when you become a master of carp (the world's smartest freshwater fish), can you truly become a master angler of all other species.
a couple of places around my area still have lots left, doing better now then opener, nice fish
